pull.title: macdeploy: minor fixups and simplifications
pull.body: This includes [one followup](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20422#discussion_r534207899) and [one bug fix](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/3d26b6b9e928e3cdc4b3d8d1f66ec7ed022b411b) from #20422, as well as some simplifications to the `macdeployqtplus` code.

verification.payload:
tree 44a6bfc4adbc461a5c3c3a32e54bbc1f6f1c08b7
parent 7cac26246a23b2843cb368fe8a68c54dde04d5d8
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1622449875 +0800
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1623212207 +0800

macdeploy: remove unused plistlib import

Unused since #20422, see: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20422#discussion_r534207899

events.message:
macdeploy: remove unused plistlib import

Unused since #20422, see: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20422#discussion_r534207899
